dct_title_s: Africa, according to Mr. D'Anville : with several additions & improvements, with a particular chart of the Gold Coast wherein ar
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:8,300,000. Hand colored. Pictorial relief. Insets: A chart of the Gold Coast ... [1:1,150,000]--[Azores or Western Islands, scale not given]. Includes descriptive text and ill. of Africans. Prime meridian: Ferro. Illus. cartouche. Dimensions: 103 x 122 centimeters
